shortdesc.ph: Reports the events of preloading music assets.

p.codeblock: void onPreLoadEvent(long songCode, int percent, String lyricUrl, int status, int errorCode);
virtual void onPreLoadEvent(int64_t songCode, int percent, const char* lyricUrl, PreloadStatusCode status, MusicContentCenterStatusCode error_code = kMusicContentCenterStatusOk) = 0;
onPreLoadEvent?( songCode: number, percent: number, status: PreloadStatusCode, msg: string, lyricUrl?: string ): void;
public abstract void OnPreLoadEvent(Int64 songCode, int percent, PreloadStatusCode status, string msg, string lyricUrl);
onPreLoadEvent?( songCode: number, percent: number, status: PreloadStatusCode, msg: string, lyricUrl?: string ): void;
final void Function(int songCode, int percent, PreloadStatusCode status, String msg, String lyricUrl)? onPreLoadEvent;

section.p: When you call the method to preload music assets, the SDK will trigger this callback.

plentry.pd: The code of the music, which is an unique identifier of the music.
The current loading progress of the music asset. The value range is [0, 100].

p.props: apple cpp electron unity rn flutter

pd.p: The loading status of the current music asset. See .

The loading statuses of the current music asset contain the following:
0: The preload of music assets is complete.
1: The preload of music assets fails.
2: The music assets are preloading.

错误码信息：
(0)：请求成功。
(1)：网关异常。 Possible reasons include the following:
当前使用的 Token 已过期。
The token is invalid. 请检查生成 Token 的方法是否正确。
Network error. 请检查你的网络。
(2)：权限错误或音乐资源不存在。 请确保你的 Agora 项目已开通内容中心权限，请联系 。
(3)：内部数据解析错误，请。
(4)：音乐加载时出错，请。
(5)：音乐资源解密时出错，请。
